items.title: Quick Installation & Configuration
items.desc: Guide users through installing and configuring oh-my-opencode, including Provider setup and verification

items.title: Meet Sisyphus: The Main Orchestrator
items.desc: Introduce the core features and basic usage of the Sisyphus agent, helping users understand the concept of agent orchestration

items.title: Ultrawork Mode: Activate All Features with One Command
items.desc: Teach users how to use the ultrawork keyword to quickly activate all specialized agents and parallel task features

items.desc: Teach users how to use the Prometheus agent for project planning, clarifying requirements through interview mode and generating work plans

items.desc: Deep dive into the background agent management system, including concurrency control, task polling, and result retrieval

items.title: Lifecycle Hooks: Automated Context & Quality Control
items.desc: Introduce the usage of 32 lifecycle hooks, helping users understand how to automate context injection, error recovery, and quality control

items.title: Slash Commands: Preset Workflows
items.desc: Introduce the usage of 6 built-in slash commands, including /ralph-loop, /refactor, /start-work, and more

items.title: Advanced Configuration: Agent & Permission Management
items.desc: Teach users how to deeply customize agent configurations, permission settings, model overrides, and prompt modifications

items.title: Configuration Diagnostics & Troubleshooting
items.desc: Provide diagnostic methods and solutions for common configuration issues, helping users quickly troubleshoot problems

items.title: Frequently Asked Questions
items.desc: Collect and answer the most common user questions, covering installation, configuration, usage, and more

items.desc: Detailed explanation of oh-my-opencode's compatibility support for Claude Code, including Commands, Skills, Agents, MCPs, and Hooks
